text: Zvonimir "Zvonko" Vujin (23 July 1943 - 8 December 2019) was a Serbian amateur boxer. He competed in the 1968 and 1972 Olympics for Yugoslavia and won bronze medals on both occasions.Zvonko Vujin . sports-reference.com In 1967 he won a silver medal at the European championships and a gold at the Mediterranean Games. He was born in Zrenjanin. He died on 8 December 2019 in Zrenjanin, Serbia at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Yugoslavian boxers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Yugoslavia
title: Zvonimir Vujin
